title: Vintage Wooden Desk
description: Beautiful solid oak desk from the 1960s. Features three drawers and original brass handles. Minor wear consistent with age. Perfect for home office or study.

title: Sony PlayStation 5 Console
description: Brand new PS5 disc edition, unopened in original packaging. Purchased in 2022. Includes one DualSense controller. Full warranty applies.

title: Mountain Bike - Giant Talon 2
description: 2022 Giant Talon 2 hardtail mountain bike. Size medium. Hydraulic disc brakes, 27.5 inch wheels. Ridden only a handful of times, excellent condition.

title: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M3
description: MacBook Pro 14-inch with M3 chip, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Space Grey. First purchased in 2022, includes original charger and box. AppleCare+ until 2026.

title: IKEA KALLAX Shelf Unit
description: White KALLAX 4x4 cube shelf unit. Assembled but in great condition. Selling due to moving. Pickup only from Auckland CBD.

title: Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum
description: Dyson V15 Detect cordless vacuum cleaner. Includes all original attachments and wall mount. Purchased new 1 year ago. Battery holds full charge.

title: Canon EOS R6 Camera Body
description: Canon EOS R6 mirrorless camera body only. Low shutter count (5,200). Includes original box, battery, charger, and strap. No scratches or damage.

title: Leather Sofa - 3 Seater
description: Genuine Italian leather 3-seater sofa in dark brown. Vintage style with classic design. Very comfortable and well-maintained. Minor wear on armrests. Smoke-free home.
